website_summaries.verdict: The Ryka Kilee was described as a comfortable, supportive, lightweight, and breathable shoe. Its Mary Jane-ish style also won the adoration of many female wearers. Even though there were several complaints about the arch support and the strap, they couldn’t outweigh the amount of positive feedback. A considerable number of buyers recommended the Ryka Kailee as great walking footwear for summer.
pros: A vast majority of buyers marveled at how comfortable the Ryka Kailee was for long periods of walking, commuting, and running errands
Many wearers lauded the shoe’s underfoot support and cushioning
The footwear was deemed lightweight by most users
It offered a breathable in-shoe experience, according to a good number of reviewers
The style of the product endeared a lot of purchasers
Several users emphasized the shoe’s roomy toe box as it was able to accommodate bunions
The price was generally considered reasonable
cons: Some people wished that the Velcro layer on the strap was longer
it was not enough to tighten up the fit
Several customers griped about the arch support: they found it to be too high and misplaced

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable, good cushioning for a "fashion" type walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Better support and cushioning than I would have expected from this type of casual shoe. I can't imagine a serious athlete would consider this a cross-trainer, but it's great for doing a lot of city walking. The toe box feels just a tad longer than my other shoes, but it fits fine. I need a wide toe box and have trouble finding shoes that fit the toe but don't slide off the heal. These worked for me. They look nicer than a traditional athletic shoe. A tad pricey for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Chowder Head

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker/sandal is a great shoe, comfortable and has some arch support also. I originally ordered a size 10 but sent it back for a 9.5, my usual size. Good width in the toes box, and you can adjust the straps quite a bit. May be a challenge for a narrow footed person to get these shoes tight enough though.
customer_reviews.author: Jtap

customer_reviews.title: Cute,  comfy and makes your feet look smaller.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is the most comfortable shoe, right out of the box. I have arthritis in the bone right where my big toe bends and I can't stand any shoe putting even the slightest pressure on that point so therefore I have to order a wide width or size up. Kudos for Ryka offering a wide in a totally adorable shoe. Another perk...these make your feet look smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but don't last
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of foot issues, and these shoes fit great and are comfortable. My only complaint is they don't last. I've owned other similar shoes for years without having to replace them; these were worn and trashed in about 7 months, and that's with wearing only 2 - 3 hours a day and on weekends. I have the light grey/pink version, and they soil very easily. I tried washing them but it only improved the look slightly. Still, the comfort outweighs the constant replacement issue so I continue to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy a size 9 m in this type of shoe. This, however, ran small. I have exchanged them and since recieved the 91/2 m which is a much better fit. There is some arch support but not enough for me. I will use my own inserts. I have no problem with the straps--they are long enough for me. The sides of the heels are high on my ankles. They are not padded like the tie versions of cross trainers. They wili require some breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie C

customer_reviews.title: Greatest find ever!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are miraculous! I suffer from footpain from tight tendons and muscles. These shoes are so wonderful that I ordered another color! I am reluctant to take them off! Feel better than my very expensive gym shoes!
customer_reviews.author: J.A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a comfortable walking shoe that was good to wear with slacks or dress and these fit the bill. I am going to buy a second pair in another color! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with Adequate Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe in a different color at the end of last summer from a TV shopping channel. It is one of the very few shoes that does NOT hurt my feet. I use this shoe mainly now when gardening and was so happy to find another pair of these shoes here in a different color and luckily in my size. Thank you, Amazon! I always like to get a spare when I find shoes that are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elle B.

customer_reviews.title: Army green
customer_reviews.text: I already had the navy which I loved and fit perfectly. However these are way too big. Same size but much larger. I could go down a size in these. I’m already wearing them so I can’t return them. Also I expected some grey color however these are Army Green. Nice but not what I thought I was getting. I love these shoes I just don’t understand how they can vary so much from color to color. update: after wearing around the house for an hour I realized they wouldn't stay on my feet they were so big. The strap is just way too long. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Mraff

customer_reviews.title: Lacks support
customer_reviews.text: The previous Ryka maryjane athletic shoes had an enormous amount of arch support and comfort, but had lacking velcro attachments. This style has little or no support, and my experience is that the ankle feels slightly collapsed. Also, the heel is too low, it could be a quarter or half inch higher. This is not a running shoe, so it need not be so flat. I only wish that Ryka would revert to the previous structure of older models. I don't recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Heel slippage.
customer_reviews.text: Love Ryka shoes. I have a lot of them! Ordered these in coral from QVC. Ordered my regular size of 7M. They are really too short. My toes are right at the tip of the shoe. Good arch support but runs slightly wide too. Great price here on Amazon so I ordered the black in a 7.5M. Fit was better lengthwise but heels slipped up and down. I won't be wearing socks with these so I sent them back. Putting a heel pad in where there's already padding would've been too much. Heel already sticking back out too far. Made shoes look too big. I returned them. Shipped in Prime time. Return was easy.
customer_reviews.author: MissKittyfromGA

customer_reviews.title: Feel good
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good. Look good. I have a pair in gray and one in black. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine skowronski

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable following bunion surgery
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a walking shoe that did not look so 'athletic shoe'. It has a nice wide toe box yet narrow enough heel that it doesn't slip. The insole is removable so I could use an orthotic insole instead. Only thing not positive was that the ribbon is not elastic and the velcro closure needs a little extra care to be sure it is lined up. That is a pretty easy adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes! This is my 3rd pair -and 3rd Colour! They are so comfortable! Would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Cruising Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, sizing varies with color.
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes! Great support, don't require the use of inserts. Sizing is a challenge when ordering online. I have a pink pair in size 7.5 that fit great. I ordered the black pair in the same size and they are too small. I gave them to my daughter who wears a 6.5 or 7 and they fit. I ordered a size up, so we'll see how they fit!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Toe Mashing Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Mashes down on my toes. Not enough room, unless your toes have been flattened by a truck. LOL! Last year's Kailee model fits much better that this year's new model. Not recommended. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: TracingMyRoots

customer_reviews.title: cute comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: The ball of my foot is wide but my heel is narrow and this shoe fits perfectly. The toe box is roomy and the heel fits snuggly. The straps are not bulky like some that crossover twice but they hold the shoe in place comfortably. The shoes are very cute to wear with either a skirt or pants.
customer_reviews.author: D Toth

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased the exact shoes. I First bought a returned random pair at Kohls. Then I could not find them in any other store. I Found them on Amazon and ordered 2 pairs. I am on my feet all day and these do not hurt my feet at all. Used to have plantar fasciitis and these shoes did not heal it, but keep it at bay! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: As usual, Ryka fits! These are comfortable for short periods of time, but after several hours the top of the shoe seems to dig into my foot. Loosening the strap doesn’t help. They are pretty and good for a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strap doesn't stay closed. When foot is flexed , strap pops off!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Strap doesn't stay closed. When foot is flexed , strap pops off!!!!
customer_reviews.author: foxylady

customer_reviews.title: Ryka Women's Kailee Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I really like my Ryka Kailee sneakers because they fit well, have good arch support and are comfortable to walk in all day. I am a older women who needs the extra arch support so this has worked out nicely for me. I would highly recommend them. They also have adjustable straps on the front of sneaker to make your fit more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for someone with a bunion. Love the wide option in all their shoes. I wear an 8 wide in their athletic shoes but had to exchange these for a seven and a half wide. They are still a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: beags

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka . I-have several pair of sandals and boots. These for some reason, did not seem to have the support I usually find. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: rrkelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I have this sneaker in every color now. Wish Ryka would bring it back in new colors. The fit on this one is so much better than the Kailee Palm. The insert is thin and flexible, but with the help of the cross strap gives decent arch support. The foot bed and sole are light, thin and flexible too; not much shock absorption If you have foot issues this would not work for a day of sightseeing. But I can get through the grocery store without my orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Voit

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for all day wear and great in a wide width if you have bunion issues.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes. Bought them in navy as well. I have severe bunions and these are the ONLY shoes that are comfortable to wear all day long with zero issues. They probably could use more arch support for those who need that, but they are perfect for me. I hope the always sell these. I am hoping to find a reasonably priced, no frills winter water proof walking boot by Ryka in 9W also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect House Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I know these are meant to be worn outdoors but I use them as house shoes. They have a roomy toe box which I love and are cool and lightweight. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Bought my first pair at a discount store. They're pretty much the most comfortable shoes I own. So, when I found them on Amazon for a great price, I got a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S

customer_reviews.title: Velcro is too short
customer_reviews.text: I love these summer shoes and would have given them 5 stars except the Velcro isn’t long enough. I had to sew a piece of Velcro so I could make it tight enough to wear comfortably. I had a bunion and these shoes don’t bother it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: wONDERFUL VELCRO FASTENERS INSTEAD OF LACES
customer_reviews.text: Old fingers don`t do tying shoe laces easy any more so the velcro fasteners work much better and the shoes stay fastened and don`t flip/slip off. YIPEE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: barbara g.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy on & off with adjustable velco closure.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when by previous Ryka mules bit the dust. Although these do not have the support that my previous Ryka's had (the previous pair were more like actual athletic shoes), they do the trick. I use them for casual wear, and they are comfortable and I like to have some shoes that I can slip into without the hassle of laces sometimes. Good shoe for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Different colors fit different
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shoe in the black and I loved it. So comfy for my bad feet. I immediately ordered another post in the navy. IT ARRIVED ALL STRETCHED OUT AS IF IT WAS WORN AND RETURNED. The good news is I returned them and immediately received a refund. So the 5 stars are for the first pair.
customer_reviews.author: E.  Russo

customer_reviews.title: Straps not long enough for Velcro closure
customer_reviews.text: Straps across the top of foot barely reach to other side to attach to Velcro closure. If you don’t match up the tiny bit of Velcro just right, the strap pops off when you take your first step. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Super shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair as I liked the black ones so much. They are so comfortable and fit my hard to fit foot. They are cute and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C

customer_reviews.title: Need larger ankles
customer_reviews.text: Though the toe box fit great and the arch support was good, I had to return to the shoes because it was met for someone with a much larger ankle. Wide do not equate to large ankles always so it would of slipped right off my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Comfy sneakers
customer_reviews.text: The style of these is a little dressier than typical athletic sneakers, but they are lightweight and comfy enough for all day wear. They would be great for travel especially if a lot of walking was on the agenda.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have these in another color - like them very much because they are easy off/on and they are comfortable for walking in the city. I bought the coral color for the spring and summer months. Very cute !!!
customer_reviews.author: am

customer_reviews.title: these are not sturdy enough for walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty but not as sturdy as other Ryka shoes I have. I am looking for a walking shoe but these are not sufficient. I'm undecided if I will return them.
customer_reviews.author: jl56

customer_reviews.title: Not safe- straps not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Strap is not only too short to close, but thin flimsy material. Feel there is a safety issue as would walk right out of shoe as is. Returning. Too bad they looked cute in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Yazel

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is lightweight and comfortable. A great shoe for travel. I now have two different colors. Hope they continue making them.
customer_reviews.author: ByHisGrace

customer_reviews.title: tHIS SHOE IS SO CUTE - COMFORTABLE, WITH AN ARCH SUPPORT AND GREAT CASUAL SHOE.
customer_reviews.text: i LIKE THIS SHOE BECAUSE IT'S REALLY COMFY AND HAS AN ARCH SUPPORT. tHE only thing I did not like, the color was not as 'soft' as shown. The color is really a bright salmon.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and my normal size fit. The back is high and are causing blisters, the straps over the arch are really not holding my foot in properly causing the back to rub.
customer_reviews.author: sloro

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe style. I bought it to replace my current shoe of this same type and make (bought some where else) that I wore out after a year of wearing.
customer_reviews.author: RickyAnn an avid reader

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: sent these as a gift for someone that needs easy to put , comfortable shoes. and pink. these were perfect. cute and great price. and they were delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kauai

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The length was fine, but the shoe was not wide enough. Ryka is a favorite brand of mine though.
customer_reviews.author: Kiko

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable, supportive shoes I own. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Comfortable, arch support, easy on and off. Velcro strap is adjustable and you can throw them in the washer with your laundry. (I separate the insole from the shoe and throw all pieces into the wash - then remove the shoes and insoles before putting the load into the dryer. I let the shoe air dry and they're good as new.) Perfect for summer!. I'm afraid they're discontinued, that's why I ordered 2 pairs at once.
customer_reviews.author: PA-OH girl

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: The wide is wide and they fit great, but almost no padding under them. Especially hard on ball of foot.
customer_reviews.author: H&K

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very light and comfortable. I have a narrow foot and was hoping ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to wear at the exercise gym. These shoes are very light and comfortable. I have a narrow foot and was hoping the strap would tighten it enough, however the velcro didn't extend far enough, but I was able to sew the strap so that it is shorter, and they tighten enough now.
customer_reviews.author: RBF

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for everyday. I sometimes slip them on, but that has broken the heel support. It doesn’t affect wear, but I’m sure weakens the shoe. Have gotten lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design Change
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers fit well and are a nice change from a laced shoe. The only complaint I have is the straps do not have long enough Velcro to make them tighter.
customer_reviews.author: dobemom

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: No support, too narrow, how hard is it for a shoe company to make WIDE SHOES?
customer_reviews.author: V Jax

customer_reviews.title: Not much support
customer_reviews.text: A little too lightweight to do much walking not enough support they do fit nicely as I do enjoy the wide width
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I had never ordered shoes on line, so was a little hesitant. I could find anything similar in the local stores. So I ordered them. I am very pleased as they fit well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Janice P.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute shoe, seemed comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY liked this shoe. The quality is good and the appearance is so cute. The shoe felt comfortable for the most part, but the arch was in an odd place, for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pony

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these very comfy and got as early. This is my second pair my first was the pink and grey. Get lots of compliments too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wide size and it was a perfect fit. The strap seemed a bit short but it's ok. So far pretty comfortable walking shoe, and I like the style.
customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are wide shoes that are actually wide and I love it. They seem very comfortable. I like a little more cushion under foot but after I added my own insert, they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: redamma

customer_reviews.title: But they feel really good.
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if those straps are going to last. But they feel really good.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Light as air yet solid in support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Ryka really shocked me, quite possibly my favorite pair of walking shoes. Ryka soars over the competition in every category.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyanne

customer_reviews.title: Love This Shoe!!  Cute & Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was just exactly as I had hoped it would be. Comfortable, supportive, cute sneaker alternative to a regular type sneaker. I bought this right before we went to Hawaii, since I needed a new pair. Took a chance that it would fit me, right out of the box. And it did. No break in time was needed, at all! Fit and comfort right from the start. Definitely would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Crews

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with orthotics!!
customer_reviews.text: A very well made sneaker that is pretty! Insert comes out for people with orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia H. Blackman

customer_reviews.title: Love the color pink&grey
customer_reviews.text: Love the color pink&grey.very comfortable and easy to slide your foot into and just latch the Velcro.only gave a four star because it runs big in size had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Lads&Lassies

customer_reviews.title: Strap not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The fit seemed nice until I tried to close the strap. I have fat feet which is why wide width usually works for me but the strap has no elasticity at all and there’s no way to really adjust it one way or the other. I’m not able to wear them so I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoes. I have many Ryka shoes buy this pair seems to be narrow. Have to return.
customer_reviews.author: debraterri

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe because it is light and the inner sole has an arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.text: THESE KICKS WERE PERFECT! WORE THEM IN LONDON (WALKED A LOT!) AND THEY HELD ME UP PRETTY WELL. ALSO IN PARIS. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Oliver-McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love These!!
customer_reviews.text: It's almost like walking on air and they are easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy from Missouri

customer_reviews.title: The item is pre-owned
customer_reviews.text: The item was described as new, although there is a lot wear marks on the shoes and a dirt on the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! So comfortable and fit so well! I have them in three colors.
customer_reviews.author: lilylyn

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy toe cap material
customer_reviews.text: Within the first two weeks of light indoor wear, the suede (or faux suede) on both toe caps began to peel and show the white underneath. The shoes look years (instead of weeks) old!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly DeBord

customer_reviews.title: Velcro straps make for a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear Rykas of some sort to work just about every day. The Kailee is my favorite! It’s super comfy and the colors/style are so fun!
customer_reviews.author: P. Bright

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Got the navy and looks great with jeans
customer_reviews.author: cherlann

customer_reviews.title: LOVE. THESE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. THESE. SHOES. It’s so hard to find cute, affordable shoes in size 12, but these are great. So comfy and so adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Ryka is such a great brand - one of the most comfortable brand of ...
customer_reviews.text: Ryka is such a great brand - one of the most comfortable brand of shoes out there. These are cute, straps are moveable, and can wear all day with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned for size, they were too large & unfortunately they did not have the smaller size. The return was easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No shoe strings! Attractive casual wear.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for mom whose loosing eye site and strenght at 92 yrs old now developing arthritis and bunions. Good toe box. Easy to velcro, no ties and daintier than sneakers. Attractive for casual use.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, perfect comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I had Ryka shoes several years ago for work and loved them. When I saw these, no laces! Wonderful! They fit and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find product
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find these shoes on Amazon as I have been searching for them for a while. Sad to say I got the last pair in my size. Love the shoes as this is my second pair......would have purchased another if it were available.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable shoes. I usually wear a size 9 and the 9 in these fit well
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Keen

customer_reviews.title: Good Supportive Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: A good shoe that fit well and supported my feet. I did insert some cushion insoles for a softer walk.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Kraft-Carr

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet.. and I was surprised to arched support in this shoe, so I decided to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Reeves

customer_reviews.title: cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: really cute shoe that fits well and is comfortable to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: gunniren

customer_reviews.title: My Sunshine shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great wish they made them in all black.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, runs a bit big but o CS I got a size that fits, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and easy to take on and off. Fits to size
customer_reviews.author: Cynthea

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable work shoes, on my feet up to 7 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Rejoice always!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: The order was received on the day scheduled. The shoes fit perfectly. I would have rated this order five star except for the fact that I have only had them for one day, which is not long enough to see how they are going to hold up long term. Overall, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are so comfortable. I was able to put them on and wear them with no issues. Great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Eitniear

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & cute
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable. I've received several compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: gi gerrin

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are attractive and great for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have bunions and these are the only shoes that are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Karen F. Lebow

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and well fitting sneaker. I ordered a 9w my regular size in shoes and sneakers and the fit was perfect. Great support too.
customer_reviews.author: Nj shopper

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes as I have arthur on top of my feet. I can walk with these shoes and they do not hurt the top of my feet as tie up athletic shoes do.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good support for a stylish shoe but the strap could be longer.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Winfrey

customer_reviews.title: Rykä Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight & comfortable, Love this brand! Rykä ((Namaste sneaker also fantastic!))
customer_reviews.author: Lysa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I must like this style as it is the fourth pair I have purchased. Love them. Like wearing slippers!
customer_reviews.author: Carole G. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Too big and wide for my size 10 foot
customer_reviews.text: Liked the look of the shoe but I have a narrow heal and bunion.Shoe was too big (Size 10) and not made in a narrow width. Had to return them much to my disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Barb T

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have them in four colors and love them. Women are frequently commenting on how cute my shoes are.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Mcguire

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but the wide fitting is a little too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Ryka shoes!  Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love Ryka shoes and this one doesn't disappoint! Very comfortable and straps are adjustable. I got the Navy with lime accents. Am going to order another color.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Bomar

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes but way too wide on my foot - returned them.
customer_reviews.author: joan collins

product_meta.title: RYKA Women's Kailee Sneaker
product_meta.description: Sporty and strappy, this easy slip-on delivers outdoor-inspired design and the latest performance features. Breathable mesh upper with synthetic overlays in a casual slip-on style with a round toe. Slip-on fit and adjustable webbing strap with hook-and-loop closure. Outdoor-inspired styling. Stitch down toe cap and heel counter deliver durability. Anatomical Precise-Return footbed. CSS Comfort Surround System with soft materials, extra cushioning, and lightweight and flexible construction. Lightweight molded EVA midsole. Rubber outsole with strategic cutouts provide traction and durability. Pivot Point for easy transitions.
feature_bullets: International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
